languages.text: "Вот только Тазарра совсем {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_TazarraDead}позабыла обо мне{/d} в последнее время. Иначе посмел бы Злоба меня тронуть! Пресытилась, наверное — им все рано или поздно надоедает. Но я очень стараюсь вернуть себе ее расположение и уже продумываю новые маленькие пьесы".

"Except Tazarra seems to have {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_TazarraDead}forgotten all about me{/d}. Would Malice have dared to make a move if she hadn't? She must have grown bored — sooner or later, they become bored of everything. But I'm trying my best to win back her favour — I already have a few ideas for new little stage plays."
languages.original_text: "Вот только Тазарра совсем {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_TazarraDead}позабыла обо мне{/d} в последнее время. Иначе посмел бы Злоба меня тронуть! Пресытилась, наверное — им все рано или поздно надоедает. Но я очень стараюсь вернуть себе ее расположение и уже продумываю новые маленькие пьесы".

traits.locale_text: "Except Tazarra seems to have forgotten all about me. Would Malice have dared to make a move if she hadn't? She must have grown bored — sooner or later, they become bored of everything. But I'm trying my best to win back her favour — I already have a few ideas for new little stage plays."
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

She must have grown bored — sooner or later, they become bored of everything. But I'm trying my best to win back her favour — I already have a few ideas for new little stage plays."
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.text: “不过，塔扎菈似乎已经把我{d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_TazarraDead}忘了个一干二净{/d}。如果不是因为这个原因，恶棍哪敢对我下手呢？她肯定早就厌倦了我，是啊，他们迟早会对一切都感到厌倦。不过，我正在努力赢回她的青睐。关于我小小的舞台剧，我已经想出了些新的点子。”
languages.original_text: "Except Tazarra seems to have {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_TazarraDead}forgotten all about me{/d}. Would Malice have dared to make a move if she hadn't? She must have grown bored — sooner or later, they become bored of everything. But I'm trying my best to win back her favour — I already have a few ideas for new little stage plays."

traits.locale_text: “不过，塔扎菈似乎已经把我忘了个一干二净。如果不是因为这个原因，恶棍哪敢对我下手呢？她肯定早就厌倦了我，是啊，他们迟早会对一切都感到厌倦。不过，我正在努力赢回她的青睐。关于我小小的舞台剧，我已经想出了些新的点子。”
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.text: 「しかし、そんなタザーラにも{d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_TazarraDead}すっかり忘れ去られてしまった{/d}ようです。さもなければマリスも私を殺そうと大胆な行動に出なかったでしょう。きっと飽きられてしまったのでしょうね――彼女たちはかなりの飽き性ですから。それでも、なんとか気をもう一度引こうと全力を尽くしています。今後のショーのアイデアもすでに思いついています」
languages.original_text: "Except Tazarra seems to have {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_TazarraDead}forgotten all about me{/d}. Would Malice have dared to make a move if she hadn't? She must have grown bored — sooner or later, they become bored of everything. But I'm trying my best to win back her favour — I already have a few ideas for new little stage plays."

traits.locale_text: 「しかし、そんなタザーラにも{d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_TazarraDead}すっかり忘れ去られてしまった{/d}ようです。さもなければマリスも私を殺そうと大胆な行動に出なかったでしょう。きっと飽きられてしまったのでしょうね――彼女たちはかなりの飽き性ですから。それでも、なんとか気をもう一度引こうと全力を尽くしています。今後のショーのアイデアもすでに思いついています」
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.text: «Solo que Tazarra parece haberme {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_TazarraDead}olvidado por completo{/d}. ¿Se habría atrevido a actuar Malicia de no ser así? Debe de haberse aburrido; tarde o temprano, se acaban aburriendo de todo. Pero hago todo lo que puedo por recuperar su favor: ya tengo unas ideas para mis próximos espectáculos».
languages.original_text: "Except Tazarra seems to have {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_TazarraDead}forgotten all about me{/d}. Would Malice have dared to make a move if she hadn't? She must have grown bored — sooner or later, they become bored of everything. But I'm trying my best to win back her favour — I already have a few ideas for new little stage plays."

traits.locale_text: «Solo que Tazarra parece haberme olvidado por completo. ¿Se habría atrevido a actuar Malicia de no ser así? Debe de haberse aburrido; tarde o temprano, se acaban aburriendo de todo. Pero hago todo lo que puedo por recuperar su favor: ya tengo unas ideas para mis próximos espectáculos».
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.original_text: "Except Tazarra seems to have forgotten all about me. Would Malice have dared to make a move if she hadn't? She must have grown bored — sooner or later, they become bored of everything. But I'm trying my best to win back her favour — I already have a few ideas for new little stage plays."

languages.text: « Cela dit, on dirait que Tazarra a {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_TazarraDead}oublié que j'existe{/d}. Autrement, Démon n'aurait jamais osé s'en prendre à moi. Elle a dû finir par se lasser de moi. Tôt ou tard, ils se lassent de tout. Mais j'essaie de regagner ses faveurs, j'ai d'ailleurs quelques nouvelles idées de mises en scène qui devraient lui plaire. »
languages.original_text: "Except Tazarra seems to have {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_TazarraDead}forgotten all about me{/d}. Would Malice have dared to make a move if she hadn't? She must have grown bored — sooner or later, they become bored of everything. But I'm trying my best to win back her favour — I already have a few ideas for new little stage plays."

traits.locale_text: « Cela dit, on dirait que Tazarra a oublié que j'existe. Autrement, Démon n'aurait jamais osé s'en prendre à moi. Elle a dû finir par se lasser de moi. Tôt ou tard, ils se lassent de tout. Mais j'essaie de regagner ses faveurs, j'ai d'ailleurs quelques nouvelles idées de mises en scène qui devraient lui plaire. »
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.text: "Aber Tazarra scheint mich {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_TazarraDead}völlig vergessen{/d} zu haben. Hätte Tücke es sonst gewagt, etwas zu unternehmen? Sie muss sich gelangweilt haben – früher oder später langweilt sie alles. Aber ich gebe mein Bestes, um ihre Gunst zurückzugewinnen – ich habe bereits einige Ideen für neue Theaterstücke."
languages.original_text: "Except Tazarra seems to have {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_TazarraDead}forgotten all about me{/d}. Would Malice have dared to make a move if she hadn't? She must have grown bored — sooner or later, they become bored of everything. But I'm trying my best to win back her favour — I already have a few ideas for new little stage plays."

traits.locale_text: "Aber Tazarra scheint mich völlig vergessen zu haben. Hätte Tücke es sonst gewagt, etwas zu unternehmen? Sie muss sich gelangweilt haben – früher oder später langweilt sie alles. Aber ich gebe mein Bestes, um ihre Gunst zurückzugewinnen – ich habe bereits einige Ideen für neue Theaterstücke."
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.text: "Gelgelelim Tazarra, {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_TazarraDead}beni unutmuş gibi görünüyor{/d}. Yoksa Melanet, hamle yapmaya cüret edebilir miydi? Benden sıkılmış olmalı. Er ya da geç her şeyden sıkılıyorlar ama tekrardan gözüne girmek için elimden geleni yapıyorum. Birkaç yeni sahne gösterisi fikri buldum bile."
languages.original_text: "Except Tazarra seems to have {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_TazarraDead}forgotten all about me{/d}. Would Malice have dared to make a move if she hadn't? She must have grown bored — sooner or later, they become bored of everything. But I'm trying my best to win back her favour — I already have a few ideas for new little stage plays."

traits.locale_text: "Tazarra {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_TazarraDead}beni unutmuş gibi görünüyor{/d} ama. Unutmamış olsaydı Melanet hamle yapmaya cüret edebilir miydi? Benden sıkılmış olmalı. Er ya da geç her şeyden sıkılıyorlar ama onun tekrar gözüne girmek için elimden geleni yapıyorum. Yeni sahne gösterileri hakkında birkaç fikir buldum bile."
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True
